Your passionate words are a dishonor to God, a disgrace to yourself, and a savor of death to those who hear them. Supposing that while you were 


                                -278- 

speaking words like many you have spoken in the past God should say, Cut him down. What would be your future? You could not find a place in heaven for, were you admitted there, you would create a rebellion if you were not made supreme ruler.--Letter 21, 1901, p. 10. (To Elder E. E. Franke, Oct. 5, 1900.)
